info.name: SportsSearchAPI
info.description: version=1.0 - Mock examples for SportsSearchAPI GraphQL service

body.raw: {"query":"query popularSearches($tenant: Tenant!, $first: Int, $filterTerms: String) { popularSearches(tenant: $tenant, first: $first, filterTerms: $filterTerms) { results { term } } }","variables":{"tenant":{},"first":1,"filterTerms":"search-term"}}

{"query":"query popularSearches($tenant: Tenant!, $first: Int, $filterTerms: String) { popularSearches(tenant: $tenant, first: $first, filterTerms: $filterTerms) { results { term } } }","variables":{"tenant":{},"first":1,"filterTerms":"search-term"}}

{"query":"query search($after: String, $algorithm: String, $tenant: Tenant!, $contentTypes: [ContentType!]!, $facets: [FacetRequest!], $filters: [Filter!], $first: Int, $searchTerms: String, $didYouMeanResults: Int) { search(after: $after, algorithm: $algorithm, tenant: $tenant, contentTypes: $contentTypes, facets: $facets, filters: $filters, first: $first, searchTerms: $searchTerms, didYouMeanResults: $didYouMeanResults) { connection { totalCount } errors facetResponse { field } } }","variables":{"after":"demo-after","algorithm":"demo-algorithm","tenant":{},"contentTypes":{},"facets":{},"filters":{},"first":1,"searchTerms":"search-term","didYouMeanResults":1}}

{"query":"query search($after: String, $algorithm: String, $tenant: Tenant!, $contentTypes: [ContentType!]!, $facets: [FacetRequest!], $filters: [Filter!], $first: Int, $searchTerms: String, $didYouMeanResults: Int) { search(after: $after, algorithm: $algorithm, tenant: $tenant, contentTypes: $contentTypes, facets: $facets, filters: $filters, first: $first, searchTerms: $searchTerms, didYouMeanResults: $didYouMeanResults) { connection { totalCount } errors facetResponse { field } } }","variables":{"after":"demo-after","algorithm":"demo-algorithm","tenant":{},"contentTypes":{},"facets":{},"filters":{},"first":1,"searchTerms":"search-term","didYouMeanResults":1}}

{"query":"query typeAhead($tenant: Tenant!, $first: Int, $input: String) { typeAhead(tenant: $tenant, first: $first, input: $input) { results { term } } }","variables":{"tenant":{},"first":1,"input":"demo-input"}}

{"query":"query typeAhead($tenant: Tenant!, $first: Int, $input: String) { typeAhead(tenant: $tenant, first: $first, input: $input) { results { term } } }","variables":{"tenant":{},"first":1,"input":"demo-input"}}
